name: mvccore/ext-form-validator-special
description: MvcCore - Extension - Form - Validator - Special - form special text and numeric validators - company ID (EU), company VAT ID (EU), credit card, hexadecimal number, IBAN bank account number, IP address and ZIP code.

suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-text: MvcCore form extension with input field types text, email, password, search, tel, url and textarea field.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-numeric: MvcCore form extension with input field types number and range.
